A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I really enjoyed The Force Awakens\, I was really impressed by Rogue One. This was a mess- poor writing\, poor humor\, and pretty much exactly the opposite of the \"critics consensus\" summary. NOT honoring the saga's rich legacy\, NOT emotion- rich action\, NOT all fans could hope for. In fact I don't know how but somehow Disney have taken all they achieved with The Force Awakens and broken it. It's like genius but the opposite of that.
